metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
Create multiple PDFs from multiple files
Send a document to get signatures from others

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Creating fillable forms is essential for HR onboarding processes. Use the Prepare Forms tool to convert static documents into interactive forms. This enables automatic field detection for text fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons, streamlining the employee data collection process.

Electronic signatures streamline compliance documentation. Open PDF forms in Acrobat and use Request E-signatures to send documents to multiple recipients in order. This ensures proper workflow for onboarding documents that require sequential approvals from managers and HR personnel.
